title: gongyunxue
author: gongyunxue
content: Excuse me, I heard that the payback period of Blue Star L1 is about 352 days. Does this payback period have any advantages?

comments.author: safar1980
comments.body: Quote from: gongyunxue on April 20, 2023, 12:12:41 PMExcuse me, I heard that the payback period of Blue Star L1 is about 352 days. Does this payback period have any advantages?bluestar L1  Miner -  4900H/S 3800WDo you have the opportunity to install and connect this ASIC?Payback only for the current moment. If LTC and Doge coins show a good price in the future, then this will give you an advantage. If more modern ASICs appear, then this will be a problem for you at an expensive price of electricity.
